content.title: Ball Mastery
content.intro_hook: Control is everything. Watch the technique.

core_concept.explanation: Close control allows a player to manipulate the ball in tight spaces, keeping it away from defenders.
core_concept.analogy: Like a magnet attached to your boots.

vocabulary_rich.meaning: Keeping the ball in the air repeatedly.
The contact made with the ball.
Ability to move quickly and easily.

questions.scenario: Look at his knees. Why are they slightly bent?

options.feedback: Spot on! Lower center of gravity is key.
